description: Episode number 12 of Series "The Commonwealth of Nations". A film survey of economic development, education and race relations in various British colonial territories. Progress in representative colonies, such as Kenya, is assessed on the basis of their ability to manage their own affairs and to achieve self-government. Narrated by Edgar McInnis.
